productText.text: Enjoy this indulgent Flavored with Savory Bacon Alfredo sauce with the bold flavor of real bacon combined with hints of cracked black pepper. For great tasting recipes, visit CampbellsKitchen.com/Prego.
productText.textHTML: Enjoy this indulgent Flavored with Savory Bacon Alfredo sauce with the bold flavor of real bacon combined with hints of cracked black pepper. For great tasting recipes, visit CampbellsKitchen.com/Prego.

productText.text: Prego® Flavored with Savory Bacon Alfredo Sauce combines the bold flavor of bacon with hints of black pepper. Enjoy on pasta or with your own recipes.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Flavored with Savory Bacon Alfredo Sauce combines the bold flavor of bacon with hints of black pepper. Enjoy on pasta or with your own recipes.

productText.text: Prego® Flavored with Savory Bacon Alfredo Sauce combines the bold flavor of bacon with hints of cracked black pepper. The bacon flavor will surely add some pizazz to your pasta or other family-pleasing recipes.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Flavored with Savory Bacon Alfredo Sauce combines the bold flavor of bacon with hints of cracked black pepper. The bacon flavor will surely add some pizazz to your pasta or other family-pleasing recipes.

productText.text: Prego® Italian sauces are made with sweet vine-ripened tomatoes and savory herbs and seasonings you can taste in every bite. Whether you’re in the mood for a zesty tomato sauce or a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce—Prego brings irresistible taste your whole family will love.
